moa.streams

Class CachedInstancesStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • moa.streams.CachedInstancesStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MOAObject, InstanceStream

    public class CachedInstancesStream
extends AbstractMOAObject
implements InstanceStream
    Stream generator for representing a stream that is cached in memory. This generator is used with the task CacheShuffledStream that stores and shuffles examples in memory.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
